div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Jan. 28, 1897. [TWENTIETH ANNIVERSARY OF] THE LUTHER LEAGUE

body.p: The twentieth anniversary of the Luther League of Chicago was held at the Swedish Lutheran Church, May and Huron Streets. The League now has twenty-one branches and twelve hundred members. The newly elected president is Reverend S. H. Holstad, who has served as pastor of his church for many years.
